data.body:
The current prompt only works for beads impl of memory integration api.

the api should be updated to require impls to supply the Take! prompt.

the beads impl should return the current prompt.

the kntos impl should do something like:

`kno claim  --agent-name <agent-name> --agent-model <agent-model> --agent-version <agent-version> <id> |  <agent-cli>`

this will likely require different flags for different agent cli types.
data.title: Take! prompt should be supplied by the implemented memory manager
